programme.title: Dot Com Mom
programme.desc: In this fish out of water tale, a traditional Indian house wife, visits her successful son in the USA but this simple mother cannot cope with the modern ways and soon finds herself in trouble.

programme.title: Dying on the Edge
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the owners of a Hollywood sound studio try to capitalize on the music business and get in over their heads with moneylenders. Starring John Heard, Jasmine Guy and Tony Crane

programme.title: Elizabeth Blue
programme.desc: Anna Schafer plays Elizabeth, a young woman struggling with schizophrenia. With the help of her Psychiatrist (Screen Actors Guild Award Winner Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje) Elizabeth is doing her best to navigate voices, hallucinations, anxiety, failing medications and her unsupportive mother .

programme.title: EM3
programme.desc: Drugs and grand theft auto, Raul lives his life on the edge. Faced with the painful choice between love and riches, Raul makes a shocking choice, blinded by the nightclub lights. A thrilling first-person view through the eyes of a drug dealer.

programme.title: Empire of Dirt
programme.desc: Going home was never an option for single mother Lena Mahikan (Cara Gee). But when her 13-year-old, Peeka (Shay Eyre) overdoses in the streets of Toronto, she is forced to return home to her estranged mother and face a life-long legacy of shame and resentment.

programme.desc: 24 Hour Free Movies brings you a growing collection of popular movies and TV shows from around the world. Always Free & Always Fun
